Could I get scans of your blank backs, please?  You can send them to [url]bowen@bowenlaw.us[/url].  Thanks.

posts.post_title: T206s for Sale - Graded, Errors, Rare Backs
posts.post_content:
Scott,

Sent email wrt the raw Cards.

Respectfully, Dave

Just an fyi...our new software downsizes the scans to fit on the board IF you use the "manage attachments" tab (right below this box) to download them from your computer. Even if they are huge it will downsize them to about 75k and they will fit. I am not aware of any scans being too large....though I admit I haven't tried anything crazy....Sorry to interrupt but wanted to make sure members know...

I should mention that .pdf files are a tad bit difficult to upload because of their file type.....I saved this as a .jpg for Scott...so here ya go...(pdf's will work but they will appear much smaller)

Scott,

Email sent for scans.


Thanks,

Jantz
